item.title: Relate Rows in Power Automate – Easily Link Dataverse Rows

item.title: Ticket System with Microsoft 365 – Part 2: SharePoint Reference List & Status Notifications
item.description: Second part of the series on building a ticket system with Microsoft 365 and Power Automate. We add a SharePoint list to store requester email and status references – enabling full checklist usage and automatic status updates.

item.title: Simple Ticket System with Microsoft Forms, Planner & Power Automate – Step-by-Step to a Quick Ticket Solution in Microsoft 365
item.description: Build a lean ticket system based on Microsoft 365 in under 60 minutes: form in Forms, tasks in Planner, automation with Power Automate – including Teams notifications and a completion workflow. Tutorial with expressions & best practices.

item.title: Custom Connector for OpenWeatherMap in the Power Platform (Power Apps & Power Automate)
item.description: Step-by-step guide: Create a custom connector for the OpenWeatherMap API, test it with Postman, and use it in Power Automate and Power Apps (Canvas).

item.title: Digital Vacation Planning with SharePoint, Power Apps & Power Automate – Complete Approval Process Step by Step
item.description: Create a complete digital vacation planning solution, including approval workflow, using SharePoint, Power Apps, and Power Automate. Includes vacation overview, day calculation, calendar views, and automated approvals – ideal for IT departments and management.
